ResourceManagerImpl

Method Detail

startLoad

public void startLoad(boolean blocking)
Loads all the resources using an AssetManager to do asynchronous loading if blocking is set to false. This method should only be called once.

Note: If called with blocking set to false, the caller must also make sure to call ResourceManager.loadAsync() until the method returns true before attempting to query the ResourceManager for resources.

Specified by:
startLoad in interface ResourceManager
Parameters:
blocking - if the loading should block the thread.

loadAsync

public boolean loadAsync()
Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
Tells the ResourceManager to keep loading resources asynchronously. Returns false while loading is still in progress. It is not safe to query the ResourceManager for resources before this method returns true.

Note: This method only applies if startLoad was called with blocking set to false.

Specified by:
loadAsync in interface ResourceManager
Returns:
boolean indicating if loading is finished. True meaning loading has finished.

getLoadProgress

public float getLoadProgress()
Description copied from interface: ResourceManager
Gets the current percentage of textures loaded, between (inclusive) 0 and 1.

Specified by:
getLoadProgress in interface ResourceManager
Returns:
percentage of texture loaded, between (inclusive) 0 and 1.

dispose

public void dispose()
Description copied from interface: Disposable
Frees up the object's assets/heavy-weight memory resources. To be run when the object is no longer needed.

Specified by:
dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
